players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Charlie, I'm concerned about your silence last night. What do you know?"
Charlie: "Bob, I investigated you last night and found out that you're the mafioso. I'm not sure what your plan is, but I think it's time we talk about this."

Diana: "Charlie, I don't think you're the detective. If you were, you would have investigated me last night instead of accusing Bob. I'm concerned about your intentions and think we should focus on finding out who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I'm the detective, I investigated Bob last night and found out he's the mafioso. We should focus on finding Alice's killer and getting rid of the mafioso."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
